pros: Working to help those in need. Very flexible work schedule. Very casual work environment.
cons: Lower wages because it is a charity.

review_title: Clients are usually great but Management is a Mess
job_title: Residential Support Worker in Toronto, ON
pros: residents are mostly great to work with.
cons:
- lack of organization from management 
- poor protocols in place for individuals (requires more oversight from professionals in the field) 
- residents have wasted potential (need more specialized programming
- management like to intimidate staff and are verbally abusive towards staff 
- management don't take care of scheduling expect staff to call out to coworkers for a call in and if you can't find coverage they expect you to stay
- management loves you to work long hours on a rotational shift so that you can develop shift insomnia 
would have given mgmt and overall rating a 0 or a negative 1 If I could.

pros: Fantastic weekend team and average pay.

review_title: My experience at this company was very pleasant and enjoyable. It was a lot of fun to work with the kids.
pros:
Was able to learn many new skills, as well as improve on skills I already had. 
It was a good work environment
cons: The job only occurs during the summer

job_title: Store Manager in Saint Thomas, ON
pros: Rewarding to work with a fantastic team and help those in need. Benefits are very good. Always closed on Sundays.
cons: Location can leave you feeling unsafe. Having a board and store committee to answer to can be confusing and frustrating as well can be overwhelming with too many demands from too many people.

pros: This no profit organization helps poor people with items they need if they don't have money.
cons: Been there 8 years, still at minimum wage, no chance for advancement financially in this organization.  I have advanced in terms of positions, I have always taken on extra duties and work hard for this organization.

pros: Great work environment, sensitive caring people.
cons: Low volume of work, hardly enough for a part time IT technician.

job_title: Community Support Worker in Victoria, BC
pros: Great Community. Compassionate coworkers and management
cons: non profits don't pay very much
